inputs.name: stringType
inputs.label: String Type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Tool name to run. Tool should be found in your path. Optionally, a fully qualified path can be supplied but that relies on that being present on the agent.
Note: You can use **$(agent.builddirectory)**\\... if you want the path relative to repo.

inputs.name: multiLineType
inputs.label: Multiline Type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Tool name to run. Tool should be found in your path. Optionally, a fully qualified path can be supplied but that relies on that being present on the agent.
Note: You can use **$(agent.builddirectory)**\\... if you want the path relative to repo.

inputs.name: stringListType

inputs.name: booleanType
inputs.label: Boolean Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

inputs.name: pickListType
inputs.label: Pick list Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Storage Account must exist prior to deployment.
